sentences.en: Binding connective tissue serves, as its name suggests, to bind body parts together.
sentences.cn: 粘合结缔组织, 顾名思义, 是用来把身体各部结合起来的.

sentences.en: Collagen and elastin provide the strength and resiliency of connective tissues such as skin and ligaments.
sentences.cn: 胶原和弹性蛋白使象皮肤和韧带这样的结缔组织具有韧性和弹性.

sentences.en: Examples may include servers, disk storage devices, tape storage devices, and connective devices associated with these items.
sentences.cn: 例子包括服务器、磁盘存储设备、磁带存储设备，和与这些相联系的连接设备。

sentences.en: In adults, fibroblasts in connective tissue rarely undergo division.
sentences.cn: 成年人结缔组织的成纤维细胞很少发生分裂.

sentences.en: It generates a scar of dense Connective tissue.
sentences.cn: 它形成致密的结缔组织疤痕.

sentences.en: It is also encased in membranes of connective tissue called the meninges.
sentences.cn: 它还被一些结缔组织的膜所包裹,这些膜叫做脑膜.

sentences.en: It may be a transitional form between dense regular connective tissue and bone.
sentences.cn: 它是致密规则结缔组织与骨组织间的过滤形式.

sentences.en: Over the other surface of the heart lies another layer of connective tissue, the epicardium.
sentences.cn: 心脏的外表面是由另一层结缔组织, 即心外膜所覆盖.

sentences.en: The arachnoid is composed of connective tissue devoid of blood vessels.
sentences.cn: 蛛网膜是由无血管的结缔组织所构成.

sentences.en: The choroid plexus is composed of loose connective tissue of the pia mater.
sentences.cn: 脉络丝由软脑膜的疏松结缔组织构成.

sentences.en: The dermis is composed of the connective tissue that supports the epidermis.
sentences.cn: 真皮是由支撑表皮的结蒂组织构成的.

sentences.en: The stroma of all lymphatic organs is made up of reticular connective tissue.
sentences.cn: 所有淋巴器官的间质由网状结缔组织组成.

sentences.en: The surgeon cut through connective tissue to expose the bone.
sentences.cn: 外科医生割开结缔组织,让骨头露出来.

sentences.en: This bridge suffers the destruction of connective rainstorm, and it is dangerous.
sentences.cn: 这座桥遭到连续的暴风雨的破坏, 已经不安全了.

sentences.en: When lying between connective tissue fibers, fibroblasts are generally elongated and spindle shaped.
sentences.cn: 当它位于结缔组织纤维间时, 纤维细胞一般呈长形及梭形.

sentences.en: White fat is partitioned by septa of loose connective tissue into clusters of adipose cells.
sentences.cn: 白色脂肪被疏松结缔组织隔膜分隔成脂肪细胞群.

words.tran_cn: [计] 连接的；有联系的；连贯的

trans.tran_cn: 起连接作用的，连接的，联结的
